class (HashAlgorithm (HASH c), DSIGNAlgorithm (DSIGN c), KESAlgorithm (KES c), VRFAlgorithm (VRF c), ContextDSIGN (DSIGN c) ~ (), ContextKES (KES c) ~ (), ContextVRF (VRF c) ~ (), Typeable c) ⇒ Crypto c where
  • type HASH c ∷ Type
  • type DSIGN c ∷ Type
  • type KES c ∷ Type
  • type VRF c ∷ Type

  • listLenBound ∷ Proxy a → Word

newtype HashHeader crypto = HashHeader {
  • unHashHeader ∷ Hash crypto (BHeader crypto)
}
name: HashHeader HashHeader unHashHeader

data PrevHash crypto
  • = GenesisHash
  • | BlockHash !(HashHeader crypto)
name: PrevHash GenesisHash BlockHash

  • labBlockNo ∷ !BlockNo
  • labSlotNo ∷ !SlotNo
  • labHash ∷ !(HashHeader crypto)
}
name: LastAppliedBlock LastAppliedBlock labBlockNo labSlotNo labHash

display_html:
data BHBody crypto = BHBody {
  • bheaderBlockNo ∷ !BlockNo
  • bheaderSlotNo ∷ !SlotNo
  • bheaderPrev ∷ !(PrevHash crypto)
  • bheaderVk ∷ !(VKey BlockIssuer crypto)
  • bheaderVrfVk ∷ !(VerKeyVRF crypto)
  • bheaderEta ∷ !(CertifiedVRF crypto Nonce)
  • bheaderL ∷ !(CertifiedVRF crypto UnitInterval)
  • bsize ∷ !Natural
  • bhash ∷ !(HashBBody crypto)
  • bheaderOCert ∷ !(OCert crypto)
  • bprotver ∷ !ProtVer
}
name: BHBody BHBody bheaderBlockNo bheaderSlotNo bheaderPrev bheaderVk bheaderVrfVk bheaderEta bheaderL bsize bhash bheaderOCert bprotver

display_html:
data BHeader crypto where
  • pattern BHeader ∷ Crypto crypto ⇒ BHBody crypto → SignedKES crypto (BHBody crypto) → BHeader crypto
name: BHeader BHeader

display_html:
data Block crypto where
  • pattern Block ∷ Crypto crypto ⇒ BHeader crypto → TxSeq crypto → Block crypto
name: Block Block

display_html:
data TxSeq crypto where
  • pattern TxSeq ∷ Crypto crypto ⇒ StrictSeq (Tx crypto) → TxSeq crypto
name: TxSeq TxSeq

display_html:
data PrtlSeqFailure crypto
  • = WrongSlotIntervalPrtclSeq SlotNo SlotNo
  • | WrongBlockNoPrtclSeq (WithOrigin (LastAppliedBlock crypto)) BlockNo
  • | WrongBlockSequencePrtclSeq (PrevHash crypto) (PrevHash crypto)
name: PrtlSeqFailure WrongSlotIntervalPrtclSeq WrongBlockNoPrtclSeq WrongBlockSequencePrtclSeq

data ChainState crypto = ChainState {

  • chainEvolvingNonce ∷ Nonce
  • chainCandidateNonce ∷ Nonce
  • chainPrevEpochNonce ∷ Nonce
  • chainLastAppliedBlock ∷ WithOrigin (LastAppliedBlock crypto)
}
name: ChainState ChainState chainNes chainOCertIssue chainEpochNonce chainEvolvingNonce chainCandidateNonce chainPrevEpochNonce chainLastAppliedBlock

PredicateFailure NewEpochFailure RupdFailure LedgerFailure OverlayFailure UpdnFailure WrongBlockBodySizeBBODY InvalidBodyHashBBODY LedgersFailure HeaderSizeTooLargeCHAIN BlockSizeTooLargeCHAIN ObsoleteNodeCHAIN BbodyFailure TickFailure PrtclFailure PrtclSeqFailure

name: initialShelleyState
